replies.body: You should post "Weekly reminder that taliyah has an indicator for her w" every week now, otherwise I think a piece of my soul will die. I really wanted it, but now it's kinda sad, ya know?
Just start making weekly posts that the new indicator is inferior to the previous one, thus starting a chain of me swapping the indicator back and forth every few months.

How about making indicators accurate in the first place so they don't have to be changed, thus removing the group of people you're referring to who will argue for the old indicator simply because it was changed?
How about turning conversations hostile for seemingly no reason?

What the fuck did you just fucking say about me, you little bitch? I’ll have you know I started my climb this season in bronze 5 with scrublords like you, and I’ve taken multiple 1v5 pentas against your scrub ass; I have over 300 stolen barons. I am trained in Vayne and yasuo outplays and I’m the top marksman in the entire botlane meta. You are nothing to me but just another target. I will wipe you the fuck out with kiting the likes of which has never been seen before on this Earth, mark my fucking words. You think you can get away with saying that shit to me over the Internet? Think again, fucker. As we speak I am contacting my secret network of DDoS'ers across the USA and your IP is being traced right now so you better prepare for the storm you filthy Teemo main. The storm that wipes out the pathetic little thing you call your league career. You’re fucking done, kid. I can DDoS you, anytime, and I can gank you in over seven hundred ways, and that’s just with my smite. Not only am I extensively trained in Inseccing, but I have access to the entire arsenal of Doran's shop and I will use it to its full extent to wipe your miserable ass off the face of the continent, you little shit. If only you could have known what unholy retribution your little “clever” comment was about to bring down upon you, maybe you would have held your fucking tongue. But you couldn’t, you didn’t, and now you’re paying the price, you goddamn idiot. I will shit fury all over you and you will drown in it. You’re fucking boosted, kiddo.
Love when rioters appreciate the memes <3{{summoner:33}}
I musta missed something in the year I've been absent. what meme is this we speak of?
That meme is a lot older than this year.
Don't expect people from Reddit to actually know where the memes they steal come from, or how old they are.
You sir deserve a Nobel in psychiatric literature.
How about we stop starting replys with "how about"
How about no?
How about them Cowboys?
Fucking {{summoner:11}} 'd

In what way? I wasn't being hostile. In fact, I was being far less hostile than Repertoir was with that comment making fun of OP. 

I simply suggested something that would help out in the long run. It's true that if the indicator had been correct in the first place, there would be no need to change it and so no group of players who could complain that the older one was better. 

A criticism of someone's shoddy work is not a personal attack. I can't help it if Repertoir takes any suggestion about the game as a personal attack on his character because it's part of his job to make sure abilities work right.
Are you okay Repertoir?
Hell yeah... I love League of Legends.
Big Short reference?

No no. He's completely serious. He absolutely loves League of Legends and its outstandingly vibrant community of communicative, supportive players. He loves the forum posters that offer constructive criticism as to how to improve the game, where they offer ideas and possible solutions to remedy the problem they're referring to, rather than simply pointing out the problem that he knows is there. He also loves all the love and support he gets from the community, who are quick to congratulate him and thank him when he makes a truly great contribution to the game, such as the champion reworks for many champions that, beforehand, were never played because their kits were simply outdated *coughUrgotcough*. So yes, RiotRepertoir loves League of Legends, and the League of Legends community. I have a sarcasm problem.
https://i.gyazo.com/b5628366e5e4e4d3567884bd1e13812b.png
This legit just had me dying for 3 minutes. Jesus christ that was great, thank you my man
That sounds like the boards alright
Can you guys look into allowing us to switch between double casting and vector please?
Yes please.
I have to start a weekly reminder now. Apparently that shit gets stuff done.
You don't have to be mean to the guy when all he's done is say that he's grateful for the change.
Nah. now they just need weekly posts that she doesn't have a new skin ;)
gg rito going around killing memes again

Probably gonna eat Shurima dust until the coast is clear, cuz you know I like dirt sometimes.

{{champion:163}}
i feel like there are a lot of taliyah mains on the boards who dont know what to do with themselves now
complain that mage items need buffs
more like "rework their itemization" but that call would actually be founded, so there is no place for it on the boards.
Well last time I said nerf Morello and Lost Chapter (-20 to -15 AP and +200 cost respectively), buff RoA, GLP, Protobelt, and maybe Veil and got downvoted to oblivion for being reasonable.
Buffing GLP and Protobelt would not solve any issues. They'd still only be bought by the champions currently buying them.
Yeah but that's fine. They're made to be niche items. Those mages wouldn't be weak or forced into Morello then.
But that doesn't do anything for the champions who are reliant on Morello and don't buy GLP, Protobelt, or RoA.
I think they'll throw another rock. {{champion:54}}

There should be a new weekly boards post about reworking Taliyah's R. Instead of her R weaving a stone wall, her R would just throw Malphite at any enemy tower and destroy it instantly. Also it's global cast like GP ult.

{{sticker:sg-syndra}}
life is meaningless now
If at first you don't succeed, throw another rock!
The year rito kills memes ft. Graves, Gragas, Taliyah and other honorable mentions

> [{quoted}](name=Fack you Brad,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=sg2bEx69,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-10-10T20:18:55.549+0000)
>
> The year rito kills memes ft. Graves, Gragas, Taliyah and other honorable mentions

Specifically the no skin for x champion meme.

> [{quoted}](name=Fack you Brad,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=sg2bEx69,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-10-10T20:18:55.549+0000)
>
> The year rito kills memes ft. Graves, Gragas, Taliyah and other honorable mentions

They also put Taliyah on rotation earlier this year, killing that "meme" too if you could call it that.
We also need a new taliyah skin for her.

So how many weeks did this take you?

Asking for a friend.

> [{quoted}](name=Elphege,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=sg2bEx69,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2017-10-10T21:32:19.577+0000)
>
> So how many weeks did this take you?
> 
> Asking for a friend.

Lost count. It wasn't always weekly either. It was more like monthly up until I realized Riot took more than a year to fix it, then I knew I had to be more persistent with it. So in terms of months, it took about 14 months lol.
lol i didnt even know this was an issue. I've always been on smartcast.
